job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: <p>We are seeking <strong>Site Reliability Engineers (also accepting Software Engineers/Developers)</strong> for a <strong>full time role</strong>. If you are looking to be part of a team that is excited about building a suite of services that are enterprise scale for one of the top ranked companies, then keep reading! We're looking for top candidates that can contribute to a top tier team.</p><p><br></p><p><strong>***FULLY REMOTE***</strong></p><p><br></p><p><strong>Requirements:</strong></p><ul><li><strong>Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science</strong>, other enumerate degree</li><li>6+ years of<strong> Java/Python</strong> experience in a professional environment</li><li>Strong professional experience in the design and development of pipelines from large databases</li><li>3 years experience in extract, cluster or classifying high quality features from unstructured data</li><li>Ability to design and implement efficient <strong>algorithms</strong>. </li><li>Ability to debug, <strong>optimize code</strong>, an automate routine tasks. </li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong><u>No 3rd party candidates, No H1B, or OPT EAD</u></strong></p><p><br></p><p><strong>Pay/Compensation Package:</strong></p><ul><li>$135K-$175K base salary (depending on experience)</li><li>$36K-$60K sign on bonus (depending on experience)</li><li>Full benefits</li><li>Stock options</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong><u>**IF you are interested and available, please forward your resume to ryan.hughes@comcentric.com or text (970) 773-7230 for immediate consideration.</u></strong></p>
